featured.text: Surrounded by flowers blooming and birds _____ merrily, the Wangs had a good time hiking in the national park.

As she points out they are not sitting at a table where rich people would sit, her parents calculate the value of the desert hills, the blooming cactus, the calls of eagles, and one another’s company.
With pink cherry blossoms blooming everywhere, the valley ______ like a young bride under the bright spring sunshine.

definition.en_def: To produce flowers; to thrive or flourish.
definition.example: The garden will bloom beautifully in the spring.
